short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Universally store your shopping in one global cart.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unicart works by listening to each time you click add to cart, and saving the closest product it can find on that page.

Unicart gives you the power to casually shop, with no commitments or annoying consistent emails to store items of interest. You should install Unicart if you don't want a wishlist on every single website, or don't want an account with every website, getting repetitive add-to-cart messages.
